name: The Naval battle of Guadalcanal
overview: Relive History's Greatest Naval Battle. Command the U.S. Fleet. Take command of U.S. Naval Task Forces in the South Pacific as you prepare to fight the Japanese in one of World War II's most crucial conflicts - The Battle of Guadalcanal. Played on both the strategic and tactical levels, Guadalcanal is as challenging to your intellect as it is to your nerves of steel. Feel the excitement build as you take control of the squadrons of planes and ships of the Enterprise, Lee and Callaghan forces. Feel the tension as you search out the enemy...calculating your moves in the strategic mode. Get ready for action as the Japanese fighters and bombers come into range and the tactical engagement actually begins.
